description: This file defines a 'Loader' component using Lightning.js framework. It renders animated circles with fade-in and fade-out effects, and includes methods for managing the animation state.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A UI component that displays animated circles to indicate loading state, with configurable color and fade transitions.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates a toggle interval that animates the opacity of the circles for a loading effect.
